title: Nosy Miniature Donkey Pawing at Dad For Attention Tugs at the Heartstrings
description: The sweet donkey was so concerned!
content:
Nosy Miniature Donkey Pawing at Dad For Attention Tugs at the Heartstrings originally appeared on PetHelpful.

It doesn't take a dog expert to see that furry friends have personalities even larger than they are, but pets aren't the only animals that love to bond, play, and tease. Farm animals can be just as sweet and sassy as any indoor pet! Whether it's a horse who loves to headbang to metal music or a cow who greets you at the fence like a dog would at the door, farm animals like Olive the miniature donkey are truly one of a kind.

Just ask her dad! He was just trying to fix the lawn mower on August 6 when Olive decided it was time to pay attention to her instead. The sweet meaning behind her nosy pawing will leave anyone smiling from ear to ear, but no one was laughing harder than the miniature donkey's mom, @kaseduran, who was watching the chaos unfold from the safety of the porch.

LOL—this funny donkey is such a card! She knows exactly what she's doing, whether she's biting at Dad's shirt sleeve or shaking her head for emphasis. Even though she's using lots of normal donkey body language, her comedic timing and persistence make me think she's been learning from watching Mom and Dad, too!

"She just wants to make sure you know about your car's extended warranty," one commenter joked. That explains why she won't stop bugging Dad! As easy as it is to think that she's just begging for attention, other donkey parents knew what was really going on here.

Related: Tiny Donkey Who Loves Being Held Like a Baby Is Pure Cuteness Overload

Another viewer explained, "Most animals understand humans don’t belong on the ground, and it freaks them out when someone they care about is on the ground."

That makes perfect sense! Olive loves her dad and wants to make sure he isn't hurt or sick. Still, something about this silly donkey's antics makes me think she's enjoying herself a little too much.

Just look at her! Olive may be full of love, but she's also mischievous and playful. It's the perfect combination!

Many farm owners and ranchers adopt miniature animals, thinking that they'll take up less space and resources. This may be true, but they also find that the personalities of mini animals are larger than life! This is just one reason why small animals like mini horses and Shetland ponies make amazing therapy animals.

Olive, the mini donkey, also has those extroverted and playful qualities, but she's a little busy bugging Dad to make appearances anywhere else. Who can blame her? She's one popular gal!



Looking for more PetHelpful updates? Follow us on YouTube for more entertaining videos. Or, share your own adorable pet by submitting a video, and sign up for our newsletter for the latest pet updates and tips.

Nosy Miniature Donkey Pawing at Dad For Attention Tugs at the Heartstrings first appeared on PetHelpful on Aug 12, 2025

This story was originally reported by PetHelpful on Aug 12, 2025, where it first appeared.
summary: The video of Olive the miniature donkey, who was seen poking at her dad for attention, has been viewed as a hilarious display of her personality. The video was shared by viewers on PetHelpful, with the donkey's mom, @kaseduran, watching the action unfold from the porch. Despite her mischievous and playful nature, Olive appears to be learning from watching her parents and parents. The personalities of these miniature animals are often overlooked for their larger size, making them more appealing to humans. This is one reason why small animals like mini horses and Shetland ponies make amazing therapy animals.
shortSummary: Nosy Miniature Donkey, Olive the miniature, pestering her dad for attention, demonstrates her distinct personalities and playful tendencies, highlighting the joy and affectionate nature of farm animals like this.

argos_summary: Olive, a playful miniature donkey, captures hearts with her antics as she tries to get her dad's attention while he works on a lawn mower. Her behavior, including pawing and biting at his shirt, showcases her affectionate and mischievous personality, reflecting the bond between farm animals and their owners. Viewers find humor in her persistence, with some suggesting she may be concerned for her dad's well-being, highlighting the unique and vibrant personalities of miniature animals.
